time_management.preparation_method: I follow a structured 3-hour daily study plan focusing on weak topics and regular revision

problem_solving.strategy: I break complex problems into smaller steps, understand the theory first, then practice similar problems

stress_management.relaxation_method: I practice deep breathing exercises and take 15-minute breaks every hour during study

study_techniques.preferred_technique: Mock tests and error analysis help me identify patterns in my mistakes and improve faster

strengths: Strong academic foundation across all subjects
Excellent time management and study discipline

Solve JEE Advanced level problems regularly
